| Origin                  = Formed as [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]]'s [[Initiative]] team by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]
| PlaceOfFormation        = [[S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier]]
| PlaceOfDissolution      = 
| Creators                = Keith Giffen; Joe Casey; Jim Muniz
| First                   = Last Defenders Vol 1 1

| HistoryText             = The Defenders were assigned to New Jersey as part of the [[50-State Initiative (Earth-616)|50-State Initiative]], because the proximity to New York City demanded more experienced warriors than can just be recruited from the ranks of [[Camp Hammond]].{{r|Last Defenders Vol 1 1}}

The team was disbanded for incompetence{{r|Last Defenders Vol 1 2}} but [[Kyle Richmond (Earth-616)|Richmond]] eventually founds a team outside the Initiative with the [[Daimon Hellstrom (Earth-616)|Son of Satan]], [[Jennifer Walters (Earth-616)|She-Hulk]], [[Krang (Earth-616)|Krang]] and Nighthawk ([[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] agent [[Joaquin Pennysworth (Earth-616)|Joaquin Pennyworth]]).{{r|Last Defenders Vol 1 6}}
